about_the_game:
Teddy is a 40-year-old who’s super into conspiracy theories. Life was going pretty smoothly for him until one day he gets a call from his girlfriend, Mel, who breaks up with him. Mel says Teddy does nothing with his life except wake up at 2 PM, play video games all day, and listen to conspiracy theory podcasts.

Heartbroken, Teddy has a moment of inspiration and comes up with a genius idea: he’ll be the first person ever to really prove that the Earth is flat.

Get ready to dive into a bizarre and electrifying adventure with over 15 challenging levels, each one packed with traps and lurking dangers that will keep you on your toes. Explore a decaying world brought to life with detailed graphics and handcrafted animations that showcase an obsessive attention to detail.

Take on multiple side quests brimming with Easter Eggs and a twisted sense of dark humor, all while jamming to a wild 90s-inspired soundtrack that sets the perfect tone. Face unpredictable and surreal boss encounters that will leave you questioning reality.

With varied mechanics ranging from skateboarding and jet skiing to using balloons to reach the highest point in the Earth’s atmosphere, this game is anything but ordinary.

Don’t waste any more time — wish list it right now!

Features:

  • Over 15 challenging levels, packed with traps and lurking dangers.
  • Multiple side quests filled with Easter Eggs and a lot of dark humor.
  • Detailed graphics that bring a decaying world to life.
  • Handcrafted animations with obsessive attention to detail.
  • A wild soundtrack that captures the essence of the 90s.
  • Unpredictable and surreal boss encounters.
  • Varied mechanics, like a skateboarding level, a jet ski level, and even a stage where Teddy uses balloons to reach the highest point in the Earth's atmosphere.
  • Don't waste time—jump into this bizarre and electrifying adventure right now!
